text: The 1940–41 UCLA Bruins men's basketball team represented the University of California, Los Angeles during the 1940–41 NCAA men's basketball season and were members of the Pacific Coast Conference. The Bruins were led by second year head coach Wilbur Johns. They finished the regular season with a record of 6–20 and were fourth in the PCC southern division with a record of 2–10. ==Previous season== The Bruins finished the regular season with a record of 8–174 and were fourth in the PCC southern division with a record of 3–9. ==Roster== ==Schedule== |- !colspan=9 style=|Regular Season Source ==References== Category:UCLA Bruins men's basketball seasons Ucla UCLA Bruins Basketball UCLA Bruins Basketball
